definition: to return/to give back/to send back/to repatriate
to deliver/to carry/to give (as a present)/to present (with)/to see off/to send
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else

sentences.english: The South Korean puppet regime must return my daughter to her mother's arms right away.
sentences.chinese: 韓國傀儡政權必須馬上送還我的女兒到母親的懷抱。

sentences.english: I'll check into it and get back to you.
sentences.chinese: 我查對一下然後送還給你。

sentences.english: And the foster parents gave his daughter back to him finally.
sentences.chinese: 最後，那對養父母還是把女兒送還給了山姆。

sentences.english: Whom Joves great Son to her glad Husband gave.
sentences.chinese: 由約夫的偉大兒子送還她丈夫。

sentences.english: He’d run six blocks to return it.
sentences.chinese: 他追了六個街區送還給我。

sentences.english: "As soon as we are done with the brain, we will return it, " Mr Winter said.
sentences.chinese: “工作一旦完成，我們就會將腦組織送還，”溫特說。

sentences.english: The money was returned intact by its finder.
sentences.chinese: 錢原封未動地被撿拾者送還。

sentences.english: I am sorry for the delay, sir. We will send it back to you right away.
sentences.chinese: 先生，對於延誤十分抱歉，我們將馬上送還衣服給您。

sentences.english: I'll check into it and get back to you。
sentences.chinese: 我查對一下然後送還給你。

sentences.english: The property has been returned to the original owner.
You think thing like this, I how be willing to the white white ground took back you?
sentences.chinese: 你想這樣的東西，我怎肯白白地送還你們？

sentences.english: I sent three shirts today in the laundry and only two came back.
sentences.chinese: 今天共送洗了三件襯衫，只送還了兩件。

sentences.english: He'd run six blocks to return it.
sentences.chinese: 他追了六個街區送還給我。

sentences.english: I"ll check into it and get back to you.
sentences.chinese: 我查對一下然後送還給你。
